name: MLP OC Name Generator
description: Stuck trying to name your My Little Pony Original Character? Neigh problem! This generator gallops to the rescue with names that sparkle, shine, and are totally magical! ✨
introduction: Everypony deserves a name as unique as their cutie mark! Whether you're crafting a powerful alicorn, a down-to-earth earth pony, or a mischievous pegasus, our MLP OC Name Generator will conjure up the perfect moniker. Prepare for a stampede of creativity!
howToUse: Hold your horses! Just click the 'Generate' button and watch the magic happen.
Don't like what you see? Click again! We've got more pony power than Princess Celestia.
Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create a name that's truly one-of-a-kind.
Write down your favorites before they flutter away like a flock of butterflies!
Share your amazing creations with the world! (And maybe give us a little credit? 😉)

faqs.question: Are these names actually good?
faqs.answer: Good? Darling, they're fabulous! We've poured over every pony book and episode to bring you names that are both creative and lore-friendly.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for fanfiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are here to inspire your creativity. Go forth and write the most epic pony tale the world has ever seen!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Then you're clearly a changeling in disguise! Just kidding! Keep generating, or use them as a jumping-off point to create your own masterpiece.

faqs.question: Will this generator give me a cutie mark idea too?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. But a great name is half the battle! Your cutie mark idea will come to you... eventually. Maybe after a sugar cube binge.

faqs.question: Is this generator compatible with all pony species?
faqs.answer: From earth ponies to alicorns and everything in between, this generator is universally pony-fied! Even for zebras, griffons and dragons!

faqs.question: How often is the generator updated?
faqs.answer: We're constantly adding new prefixes and suffixes to keep the creativity flowing like a river of friendship! Check back often for fresh inspiration.
